Joseph Farah strikes a blow for a certain kind of religionist in his paean to intolerance.............
 
 " It would be folly to pray for his success in such an evil campaign. 
 
 I want Obama to fail because his agenda is 100 percent at odds with God's. "
 
 
 I wonder if even WND would print it if he didn't own it. Only the worst kind of people believe that only they have 100% understanding of what their God wants.
